title: Bank of China executive joins London Bullion Market Association board
text:
Bank of China executive joins London Bullion Market Association board

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 03:00)

© Reuters. Bank of China executive joins London Bullion Market Association board LONDON (Reuters) - The London Bullion Market Association (LBMA) said on Monday a senior executive at Bank of China would join its board. Wenjian Fang is general manager of Bank of China London Branch and chief executive of the bank's British subsidiary, the LBMA said in a statement. An industry association that sets standards for bullion trading and refining, the LBMA has been expanding its presence in China, the world's largest gold producer and consumer.
